import axios from'axios';import axiosConfig from'./../../../../../axiosConfig';import Swal from'sweetalert2';var UserId=localStorage.getItem('user_id');console.log(UserId);// Get Category List for thread 
export var CategoryList=function CategoryList(){return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/listThreadCategories').then(function(res){console.log(res);dispatch({type:'GET_LISTOF_CATEGORY',data:res.data});});};};// ** Get tread list 
export var gettreads=function gettreads(catId){return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/getThreadUnreadCount',{userid:UserId,status:"",page_no:0,page_limit:10,sort_by:"status",search_by:'',thread_categoryid:catId}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'GET_TREAD',data:res.data});});};};// add new tread
export var addNewtreads=function addNewtreads(formValue,props){return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/addThread',{userid:UserId,threadcategory_id:"1",admin_note:"note",display_name:formValue.title,display_desc:formValue.thread,moderator_ids:""}).then(function(res){console.log(res);axiosConfig.post('/admin/addThread',{threadid:res.data.data[0].thread_id,selection_type:"0",selected_ids:UserId}).then(function(r){return console.log(r);});props.setSentPop(true);props.toggleModal();});};};// ** GET Mails
export var getTopics=function getTopics(params){// console.log(params)
return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/getCommentIdList',{thread_id:params.folder.thread_id,comment_id:""}).then(function(res){console.log(res);dispatch({type:'GET_MAILS',data:res.data,params:params});});};};// ** SELECT Current Mail
export var selectCurrentMail=function selectCurrentMail(id){return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/getCommentDetails',{id:id}).then(function(res){console.log(res);dispatch({type:'SELECT_CURRENT_MAIL',mail:res.data});});};};// add comment and subComment 
export var addCommentSubComment=function addCommentSubComment(title,images,detail,props,replyDetail){console.log(props);return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/addUpdateThreadComment',{comment_id:"",thread_id:detail&&detail.thread_id||replyDetail.thread_id,comment:title,userid:UserId,parent_id:detail&&detail.id||replyDetail.id,files:JSON.stringify(images)}).then(function(res){if(res.data.success===1){Swal.fire({title:'Success!',text:'Topic submitted successfully',icon:'success',confirmButtonText:'OK',confirmButtonColor:'#28c76f'});return"success";}else{Swal.fire({title:'Error!',text:'Something Went Wrong !',icon:'error',confirmButtonText:'Try Again',confirmButtonColor:'#EE3224'});return"error";}});};};// add comment and subComment 
export var addTopic=function addTopic(comment_data,images,detail,props){return function(dispatch){return axiosConfig.post('/admin/addUpdateThreadComment',{thread_id:detail.thread_id,comment:comment_data,userid:UserId,parent_id:0,comment_id:0,files:JSON.stringify(images)}).then(function(res){if(res.data.success===1){Swal.fire({title:'Success!',text:'Topic submitted successfully',icon:'success',confirmButtonText:'OK',confirmButtonColor:'#28c76f'});// dispatch({ type: 'GET_TREAD', data: res.data })
return"success";}else{Swal.fire({title:'Error!',text:'Something Went Wrong !',icon:'error',confirmButtonText:'Try Again',confirmButtonColor:'#EE3224'});return"error";}});};};// ** UPDATE Mails
export var updateMails=function updateMails(emailIds,dataToUpdate){return function(dispatch,getState){return axios.post('/apps/email/update-emails',{emailIds:emailIds,dataToUpdate:dataToUpdate}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'UPDATE_MAILS',emailIds:emailIds,dataToUpdate:dataToUpdate,data:res.data});dispatch(getTopics(getState().email.params));});};};// ** Update Mail Label
export var updateMailLabel=function updateMailLabel(emailIds,label){return function(dispatch,getState){return axios.post('/apps/email/update-emails-label',{emailIds:emailIds,label:label}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'UPDATE_MAIL_LABEL',data:res.data});dispatch(getTopics(getState().email.params));});};};// ** GET Next/Prev mail
export var paginateMail=function paginateMail(dir,emailId){return function(dispatch){return axios.get('/apps/email/paginate-email',{params:{dir:dir,emailId:emailId}}).then(function(res){dispatch({type:'PAGINATE_MAIL',data:res.data});});};};// ** SELECT Mail
export var selectMail=function selectMail(id){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'SELECT_MAIL',id:id});};};// ** SELECT All Mails
export var selectAllMail=function selectAllMail(val){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'SELECT_ALL_MAIL',val:val});};};// ** RESET Selected Mails
export var resetSelectedMail=function resetSelectedMail(){return function(dispatch){return dispatch({type:'RESET_SELECT_MAILS'});};};
